entry.title: Google Play Store (Game) - DarkDIRE: The Advanced Set

div.p: Claim it now for free on Google Play Store.
About the game (DarkDIRE: The Advanced Set*):

ul.li: Description: Inspired by old-school rogue-like and RPGs, DarkDIRE uses simple graphics/animation to build a living world. Explore endless procedurally generated kingdoms and dungeons. Gain loot by raiding enemy kingdoms. Sell it to become rich and powerful. Maybe even powerful enough to rule your own kingdom.

div.p: * Any information about the offer is automatically grabbed and may in rare cases not match the correct game.

p.small: Source: Google Play Store, Seen first: 2024-02-16 12:00:33, Generated by LootScraper

entry.title: Google Play Store (Game) - idle monsters

div.p: Claim it now for free on Google Play Store.
About the game (Idle Monsters*):

ul.li: Description: Abandoned RPG and monster combination! Let's master the mutation and heredity and grow the strongest monster! All battles and dungeon searches will proceed automatically. It is a game specialized for those who want to enjoy the game in their spare time. Incremental game x hack and slash x monster combination. An infinitely playable incremental game!
Genres: Casual, Free to Play, Indie, Strategy

div.p: * Any information about the offer is automatically grabbed and may in rare cases not match the correct game.
